about.title: About Lin Shaoheng
about.description: I am an engineering student who is interested in social issues. I like programming and creating some interesting things. I think programming is an art that can express one's thoughts and emotions. I hope to be able to express myself through My skills can bring positive impact to society.

election.title: (Should be) a more accurate opinion poll aggregation
election.subtitle: In order to reduce the impact of political manipulation on election polls, we can provide more objective and reliable information on voter intentions by averaging poll data from multiple different sources.
